add_subdirectory(ut)

add_library(libs-storage-stats_service)
target_link_libraries(libs-storage-stats_service PUBLIC

  yutil

  blockstore-libs-diagnostics
  blockstore-libs-discovery

  ydb-core-base
  ydb-core-mind
  ydb-core-mon
  ydb-core-protos

)
